Moods.

Imperative present used thirty-one times, aorist twenty-eight times3 the latter used to express urgency without implying a mere momentary action, i. 2 πᾶσαν χαρὰν ἡγήσασθε, V. 7 μακροθυμή- σατε ἕως τῆς παρουσίας τοῦ Κυρίου (cf. Winer p. 395).
